newsitem.title: USA: AM-PAC says ends talks for LeisureShare and Sabo.
newsitem.headline: AM-PAC says ends talks for LeisureShare and Sabo.

text.p: AM-PAC International Inc said Thursday it has ended all phases of negotiations for the acquisition of LeisureShare International PLC and Sabo Management Group Ltd .

The company said both company's financial statements were not formatted to allow it to conform to US SEC accounting regulations. The company said it did not feel it could complete these acquisitions without potential damage to shareholder value.

The company said it continues to expand its core business of Captain Tony's Pizza restaurants, and cited its recent press release announcing the new developmental franchise agreement for Salt Lake City as an example.
The company said it plans to expand its franchise program in the United States with a marketing campaign this summer.
AM-PAC International Inc is a holding company focused on international food, beverage and leisure opportunities.
